title: Paraffin-Free
body: Unlike most candles, ours are free of paraffin wax, which is known to release toxic carcinogens when burning. Instead, we use a blend of only natural soy and coconut waxes.

title: Phthalate-Free
body: Our products do not contain phthalates, which are often found in candles and cosmetics, and are detrimental to the reproductive, neurological, and developmental systems of humans.

title: Paraben-Free
body: Everything we offer is free of parabens, which are commonly used as preservatives in candles and cosmetics. These chemicals are thought to cause cancer and harm the environment.

title: Vegan
body: None of our items contain animal products or ingredients derived from animals.

title: Cruelty-Free
body: Our products and their ingredients are never tested on animals.

title: Sustainable
body: We use sustainable ingredients and practices to protect the environment.

title: Carcinogen-Free
body: Our products are free of carcinogens, which are known to cause cancer, tumors, and reproductive harm.

title: Mutagen-Free
body: None of our items contain mutagens, which are known to cause heritable genetic mutations and diseases.

title: Toxin-Free
body: Our products are free of organ, reproductive, and acute toxins, which cause diseases and adverse effects in humans.
